predicate.note: Frames file for 'emigrate' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Departing.

example.name: with destination
example.text: Program traders are fond of predicting that if they are blocked in the U.S., they will simply emigrate to foreign stock markets.
example.arg: if they are blocked in the U.S.

example.name: better hats?
example.text: ``I emigrated to wear better hats, do better parties,'' she said with a giggle.
example.arg: to wear better hats, do better parties

example.name: with source
example.text: John's family emigrated from Lower Slobovia in 1914.
